医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
揭示根深蒂固的学校做法对儿童造成的心理伤害心理学家警告说，许多“根深蒂固于学校文化”的项目对儿童有害，并可能造成潜在的持久损害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Uncovering-the-psychological-toll-of-entrenched-school-practices-on-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Uncovering-the-psychological-toll-of-entrenched-school-practices-on-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc03ffc7-cf19-4f6c-bdf5-c885ceff078d Mon, 13 May 2024 08:55:37 -0400 Uncovering the psychological toll of entrenched school practices on children
研究揭示了加拿大最新的癌症趋势根据 CMAJ 的最新癌症趋势研究，由于人口增长和老龄化，加拿大的癌症病例和死亡人数预计将增加，但癌症诊断和死亡的总体比率将继续下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Study-reveals-latest-cancer-trends-in-Canada.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Study-reveals-latest-cancer-trends-in-Canada.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e17​​190b5-e25d-402b-9285-7a549314df3d Mon, 13 May 2024 08:41:00 -0400 Study reveals latest cancer trends in Canada
FDA 表示从未检查过制造有争议 AGGA 设备的牙科实验室十多年来，FDA 从未对约翰牙科实验室进行过检查，该实验室生产前牙生长引导器具（AGGA），这是一种据称伤害患者的牙科设备，目前已成为刑事调查的对象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/FDA-said-it-never-inspected-dental-lab-that-made-controversial-AGGA-device.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/FDA-said-it-never-inspected-dental-lab-that-made-controversial-AGGA-device.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f1461ab-1ffc-4e86-b9a8-9be1d974bf2d Mon, 13 May 2024 08:36:01 -0400 FDA said it never inspected dental lab that made controversial AGGA device
对白桦茸对抗口腔癌机制的新见解白桦茸提取物对 HSC-4 人类口腔癌细胞的抗肿瘤活性机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/New-insights-into-Chaga-mushrooms-mechanisms-for-fighting-oral-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/New-insights-into-Chaga-mushrooms-mechanisms-for-fighting-oral-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b939bad-199f-45a9-99fe-a9263a916a74 Mon, 13 May 2024 08:35:00 -0400 New insights into Chaga mushroom's mechanisms for fighting oral cancer
用于新生儿和新生儿健康监测的具有皮肤界面的可穿戴生物传感器新生儿可穿戴系统的最新改进，集中在皮肤界面可穿戴设备上，用于跨多个分支的生理监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Wearable-biosensors-with-skin-interfaces-for-newborn-and-neonatal-health-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Wearable-biosensors-with-skin-interfaces-for-newborn-and-neonatal-health-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca0d093a-44b4-433a-977c-89c5dba5a891 Mon, 13 May 2024 08:03:00 -0400 Wearable biosensors with skin interfaces for newborn and neonatal health monitoring
旧金山通过将福利与戒毒所挂钩来尝试严厉的爱雷蒙德·拉诺 (Raymond Llano) 在旧金山的格莱德纪念教堂 (Glide Memorial Church) 排队等候午餐时，一手拎着一个塑料袋，里面装着他所有的东西，另一只手拿着一杯咖啡，腋下夹着一个压扁的纸板箱当床。 55 岁的他在塔吉特 (Target) 失业后已经 15 年没有家了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/San-Francisco-tries-tough-love-by-tying-welfare-to-drug-rehab.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/San-Francisco-tries-tough-love-by-tying-welfare-to-drug-rehab.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49d19fd2-5fb9-4037-9c95-a0695f06b510 Mon, 13 May 2024 07:43:06 -0400 San Francisco tries tough love by tying welfare to drug rehab
加利福尼亚州辩论合法化之际，急救人员和退伍军人欢呼迷幻药物的好处韦德·特拉梅尔 (Wade Trammell) 回忆起有一次他和他的消防员同事在高速公路上发生车祸，一辆啤酒卡车撞上了一根柱子，卡车的发动机穿过驾驶室，撞到了驾驶员的腹部。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/First-responders-veterans-hail-benefits-of-psychedelic-drugs-as-California-debates-legalization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/First-responders-veterans-hail-benefits-of-psychedelic-drugs-as-California-debates-legalization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80366f4e-bd6a-4759-abaa-1e76122beb9d Mon, 13 May 2024 07:38:27 -0400 First responders, veterans hail benefits of psychedelic drugs as California debates legalization
ArgusEye 完成 280 万欧元融资以加速生物加工ArgusEye 是一家实时监测生物系统的创新传感器解决方案提供商，今天宣布完成融资，筹集了 280 万欧元（约合 240 万英镑），使公司筹集的资金总额达到 345 万欧元（约 300 万英镑）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/ArgusEye-closes-e282ac28-million-funding-to-accelerate-bioprocessing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/ArgusEye-closes-e282ac28-million-funding-to-accelerate-bioprocessing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb4f0053-d08b-4c54-824b-90bc633699ca Mon, 13 May 2024 07:04:00 -0400 ArgusEye closes €2.8 million funding to accelerate bioprocessing
ERS Genomics 任命 John E Milad 为首席执行官CRISPR 许可公司 ERS ​​Genomics Limited（“ERS”）今天宣布任命 John E Milad 为首席执行官，立即生效。 John 拥有超过 25 年的执行领导者、风险投资家和投资银行家经验，专注于生命科学和医疗技术领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/ERS-Genomics-appoints-John-E-Milad-as-Chief-Executive-Officer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/ERS-Genomics-appoints-John-E-Milad-as-Chief-Executive-Officer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a992e185-5d08-4097-86c6-4d76a0b680e6 Mon, 13 May 2024 07:00:00 -0400 ERS Genomics appoints John E Milad as Chief Executive Officer
虚拟现实可以成为大脑健康的未来吗？新研究表明 VR 锻炼可增强工作记忆虚拟现实（VR）运动对大脑功能的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Can-virtual-reality-be-the-future-of-brain-health-New-research-suggests-VR-exercise-enhances-working-memory。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Can-virtual-reality-be-the-future-of-brain-health-New-research-suggests-VR-exercise-enhances-working-memory。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efced50e-12a9-48cd-8244-a67badcfdf99 Mon, 13 May 2024 06:29:00 -0400 Can virtual reality be the future of brain health? New research suggests VR exercise enhances working memory
